definition: good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
(of systems, facilities etc) comprehensive/well-developed/excellent/to refine/to improve
to be good at/to be adept at
to deal with the aftermath (arising from an accident)/funeral arrangements/reparations
bad/ill/not good at/not to be pooh-poohed/quite impressive

sentences.english: We will fight, for what she sings of is beautiful and good.
sentences.chinese: 我們一定會投身戰鬥的，因爲她所歌唱的是美與善。

sentences.english: Doing good deeds requires self-confidence, to dispel all doubts and fear.
sentences.chinese: 爲善要有自信，才能發揮不畏懼的堅定力量。

sentences.english: Abide, friend, your mother bided till you were born.
sentences.chinese: 堅持啊朋友，母親善堅持，你方能出世。

sentences.english: Esthetically, its nucleus is the relationship between ideal and friendliness.
sentences.chinese: 從美學角度研究禮樂，它的核心是美與善的關係。

sentences.english: Doing good deed can be explained as deed that benefit people and bad deed is deed that hurt or harm people.
sentences.chinese: 但如果你做的是善的卻沒有善念，這也是善行。

sentences.english: Young people must be taught to learn the differnces between good and evil.
sentences.chinese: 必須教導青年人學會區分善與惡。

sentences.english: My loneliness and I are a pair of partners, like grudging .
sentences.chinese: 我，和我的孤獨，是一對善嫉的拍檔。

sentences.english: Shall evil be recompensed for good? for they have digged a pit for my soul.
sentences.chinese: 豈可以惡報善呢？他們竟挖坑要害我的性命。

sentences.english: I was too young at that time and had not met a true practitioner.
sentences.chinese: 那時候很年輕，實在沒有遇到善知識。

sentences.english: It is beyond argument that every human being is a composite of good and evil.
sentences.chinese: 每個人都是善與惡的混合體，這是無可爭辯的事實。

sentences.english: Do good, O Lord , to those who are good, to those who are upright in heart.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華阿，求你善待那些爲善，和心裏正直的人。

sentences.english: Giulio Aleni affirmed that anima had two tendencies, that is the good and the evil.
sentences.chinese: 艾儒略肯定靈魂有爲善作惡兩種傾向。

sentences.english: Through these questions, Mencius put forward the ultimate basis of goodness.
sentences.chinese: 通過對善的不斷追問，孟子爲善建構了形上學的根據。

sentences.english: And no good thing is hurtful?
sentences.chinese: 難道說善的事物就沒有害處？

sentences.english: It is the mind that maketh good or ill, that maketh wretch or happy, rich or poor.
sentences.chinese: 是意識決定了善或惡，不幸或幸福，富有或貧窮。

sentences.english: Confucius on the likelihood of good through attractive, reflecting the teaching of art throughout.
sentences.chinese: 孔子的循循然善誘人，體現了教學的藝術之境。

definition: the theory of Mencius that people are by nature good
Jente township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
Renai or Jenai district of Keelung City 基隆市[Ji1 long2 shi4], Taiwan/Renai or Jenai township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy
to be of service to others/to help others/benevolent
